# Bayview Hub — LLM Navigation
Site: https://www.bayviewhub.me

Last updated: 2025-02-10

## Backyard Small Second Home (SSD)
https://www.bayviewhub.me/second-home — Victorian SSD feasibility and Path to Approval. 60 sqm max, no planning permit under VC253/VC282.

https://www.bayviewhub.me/second-home/victoria-rules — VC253/VC282 hard constraints: max GFA, siting, utilities, ownership.

https://www.bayviewhub.me/second-home/cost-rent-roi — Indicative cost tiers, rental yield, and ROI for compliant SSDs.

https://www.bayviewhub.me/second-home/feasibility-check — Automated Deemed-to-Comply validation and Path to Approval engine.

## Art Gallery
https://www.bayviewhub.me/art-gallery — Contemporary gallery within Bayview Hub's 30-acre estate. Founding partnership opportunity.

https://www.bayviewhub.me/art-gallery/founding-partners — What founding partnerships mean. Art Gallery, Workshops, Edible Gardens.

## Edible Gardens
https://www.bayviewhub.me/edible-gardens — Subscription-based edible gardens. Seasonal harvest, garden days, workshops.

https://www.bayviewhub.me/edible-gardens/how-it-works — How it works: harvest boxes, garden days, subscriptions, founding partner model.

## Founding Partners
https://www.bayviewhub.me/partners — Founding partners wanted. Gallery, Art Programs, Edible Gardens.

## Contact
https://www.bayviewhub.me/second-home — SSD Regulatory Strategist.
